trans-unit.source: Provides access to a rich set of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] typography properties.
The Typography object exposes the set of features that an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] font supports.
By setting the properties of Typography in markup or code, you can easily author documents that take advantage of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] features.
The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps".
In this case, the same font size is used for all three words.

![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") Text using OpenType capitals The following markup example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using properties of the Typography object.
When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored.

[!code-xml[OpenTypeFontSnippets#9](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.documen_9_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[OpenTypeFontSnippets#9](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.documen_9_1.xaml)] The following code example accomplishes the same task as the previous markup example.

[!code-vb[TypographyCodeSnippets#TypographyCodeSnippet1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/typographycodesnippets/page1.xaml.vb#typographycodesnippet1)] [!code-cs[TypographyCodeSnippets#TypographyCodeSnippet1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/TypographyCodeSnippets/Page1.xaml.cs#typographycodesnippet1)] ## Typography Properties The following table lists the properties, values, and default value of the Typography object.

|Property|Value(s)|Default Value| |--------------|----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates%2A>|Numeric value – byte|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.StylisticSet19%2A>|<xref:System.Boolean>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.StylisticSet20%2A>|<xref:System.Boolean>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.FontVariants> | <xref:System.Windows.FontVariants> | <xref:System.Windows.FontVariants> | <xref:System.Windows.FontVariants> | <xref:System.Windows.FontVariants> | <xref:System.Windows.FontVariants>|<xref:System.Windows.FontVariants>.<xref:System.Windows.FontVariants>| All dependency properties of this class also have an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
For instance, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates%2A> property through this syntax: `<`*object*``**Typography.AnnotationAlternates**`="`*value*`".../>`
Gets or sets a value that specifies the index of an alternate annotation form.
The index of the alternate annotation form.
The default value is 0 (zero).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.FontCapitals"></xref> enumerated value that indicates the capital form of the selected font.
A <xref href="System.Windows.FontCapitals"></xref> enumerated value.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.FontCapitals"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether inter-glyph spacing for all-capital text is globally adjusted to improve readability.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if spacing is adjusted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.CapitalSpacing*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Capitals*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether glyphs adjust their vertical position to better align with uppercase glyphs.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the vertical position is adjusted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.CaseSensitiveForms*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether custom glyph forms can be used based upon the context of the text being rendered.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom glyph forms can be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.ContextualAlternates*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether contextual ligatures are enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if contextual ligatures are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.ContextualLigatures*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the index of a contextual swashes form.
The index of the standard swashes form.
The default value is 0 (zero).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.ContextualSwashes*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether discretionary ligatures are enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if discretionary ligatures are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.DiscretionaryLigatures*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that determines whether the standard Japanese font forms have been replaced with the corresponding preferred typographic forms.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if standard Japanese font forms have been replaced with the corresponding preferred typographic forms; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.EastAsianExpertForms*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.FontEastAsianLanguage"></xref> enumerated value that indicates the version of glyphs to be used for a specific writing system or language.
A <xref href="System.Windows.FontEastAsianLanguage"></xref> enumerated value.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.FontEastAsianLanguage"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.EastAsianLanguage*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.FontEastAsianWidths"></xref> enumerated value that indicates the proportional width to be used for Latin characters in an East Asian font.
A <xref href="System.Windows.FontEastAsianWidths"></xref> enumerated value.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.FontEastAsianWidths"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.EastAsianWidths*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.FontFraction"></xref> enumerated value that indicates the fraction style.
A <xref href="System.Windows.FontFraction"></xref> enumerated value.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.FontFraction"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Fraction*> attached property.
To be added.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.AnnotationAlternates*> property.
The current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontFamily*> attached property on the specified dependency object.

The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.StylisticSet9*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.FontVariants"></xref> enumerated value that indicates a variation of the standard typographic form to be used.
A <xref href="System.Windows.FontVariants"></xref> enumerated value.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.FontVariants"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Typography.Variants*> attached property.
To be added.
